com.springapp.mvc

Class LDAP

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.springapp.mvc.ldap.LDAP

  • public class LDAP
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a collection of static functions used to interact with the LDAP server.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • config

        protected static java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> config(ActiveLogin activeLogin)
                                                                        throws javax.naming.NamingException
        Receives a DistinguishedName in the form of an ActiveLogin object (i.e. uid=firstname.lastname,ou=Users,dc=studentmediene,dc=no) and a password. It then binds the provided username to the server. It returns the bind in the form of a Hashtable. Throws a NamingException if the username is not found on the server.
        Parameters:
        activeLogin - An object containing the DistinguishedName and the credentials
        Returns:
        Returns a Hashtable of the binding to the server.
        Throws:
        javax.naming.NamingException - Thrown if the DistinguishedName is not found on the server

      • search

        protected static PersonList search(java.lang.String search)
                            throws javax.naming.NamingException
        Searches the server for the supplied String. Searches mail, name and DistinguishedName.

        Uses the SearchProcessing.getPersons(javax.naming.NamingEnumeration) function in SearchProcessing

        Returns a PersonList object with all the users matching the search terms. Throws a NamingException received from the config(ActiveLogin) function.

        Parameters:
        search - The String to search for.
        Returns:
        Returns a PersonList object with Person objects corresponding to the search term
        Throws:
        javax.naming.NamingException - Thrown upwards by the config function
        See Also:
        SearchProcessing, PersonList

      • checkRightsLevel

        protected static int checkRightsLevel(ActiveLogin activeLogin,
                   java.lang.String editDn)
        Used to find the rights level of the current user. Takes the dn and cr and binds to the server.

        0 = Write access on your own user, otherwise read-only (Not member of any group in ou=Rights)

        1 = Write access within right (Member of cn=seksjonsAdmin,ou=Rights,ou=Groups,dc=studentmediene,dc=studentmediene,dc=no)

        2 = Write access level "Gjengsjef", can edit everyone except it-drift (Member of cn=gjengadmin,ou=Rights,ou=Groups,dc=studentmediene,dc=studentmediene,dc=no)

        3 = IT-Drift (Member of cn=superAdmin,ou=Rights,ou=Groups,dc=studentmediene,dc=studentmediene,dc=no)

        Parameters:
        activeLogin - An ActiveLogin object with a DistinguishedName and the credentials
        editDn - The DistinguishedName of the user that is being edited
        Returns:
        Returns the rights level between the two supplied users
